title: After Months of Silence, Chinese and U.S. Climate Envoys Briefly Speak
description: John Kerry, the top U.S. climate negotiator, has met at least three times with his Chinese counterpart at COP27. Their countries are the planet’s biggest polluters.
dc:creator: Max Bearak and Lisa Friedman
category: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
media:description: John Kerry, the U.S. special climate envoy, giving a talk at the United Nations climate summit in Sharm el Sheikh, Egypt, on Wednesday. “We need to be talking to each other,” he said.
